long_description: The sporty and sophisticated women's Smith Lookout Sunglasses feature gradient lens performance and a frame shape that is the perfect compliment to your catlike reflexes. Meow. Navy Aqua Fade frames feature Gray Gradient lenses that reduce color distortion in bright light. Rootbeer Fade frames feature Brown Gradient lenses to enhance your vision in a wide range of light and weather conditions. Castor-based polymer frames feature hydrophilic Megol nose and temple pads for reliable grip. The Smith Lookout Sunglasses have a medium fit with large coverage.
